definition[0]: to spend time lazily, doing things slowly and in a way that is not planned
example[0]: He spent his vacation messing around on the farm.
definition[1]: to behave in a silly way when you should be paying attention or doing something sensible
example[1]: Stop messing around and get ready for school.
definition[2]: to cause a lot of problems for someone, especially by changing your mind often and not being completely honest
example[2]: Don’t mess me around – I want the money you promised me.
